name: mailcow
summary: This content pack will provide you with insights into your mailcow setup

description.@value: mailcow: dockerized stats from the past week
Netfilter: Block reasons of all tries

query.@value: container_name:mailcowdockerized_postfix-mailcow_1 && "Recipient address rejected: Greylisting in effect, please come back later"

data.name: POSTFIX_LOSTCONN_REASONS
data.pattern: (receiving the initial server greeting|sending message body|sending end of data -- message may be sent more than once)

data.name: POSTFIX_LOSTCONN
data.pattern: (Connection timed out|No route to host|Connection refused|Network is unreachable|lost connection|timeout|SSL_accept error|-1)

data.name: POSTFIX_ANVIL_CONN_COUNT
data.pattern: statistics: max connection count %{NUMBER:postfix_anvil_conn_count} for \(%{DATA:postfix_service}:%{IP:postfix_client_ip}\) at %{SYSLOGTIMESTAMP:postfix_anvil_timestamp}

data.name: POSTFIX_PS_VIOLATIONS
data.pattern: %{POSTFIX_PS_VIOLATION:postfix_postscreen_violation}( %{INT})?( after %{NUMBER:postfix_postscreen_violation_time})? from %{POSTFIX_CLIENT_INFO}(( after %{POSTFIX_SMTP_STAGE:postfix_smtp_stage})?(: %{GREEDYDATA:postfix_postscreen_data})?| in tests (after|before) SMTP handshake)

data.name: POSTFIX_SMTP_UTF8
data.pattern: host %{POSTFIX_RELAY_INFO} offers SMTPUTF8 support, but not 8BITMIME

data.name: POSTFIX_TLSCONN
data.pattern: (Anonymous|Trusted|Untrusted|Verified) TLS connection established (to %{POSTFIX_RELAY_INFO}|from %{POSTFIX_CLIENT_INFO}): %{DATA:postfix_tls_version} with cipher %{DATA:postfix_tls_cipher} \(%{DATA:postfix_tls_cipher_size} bits\)

data.name: POSTFIX_ANVIL_CONN_RATE
data.pattern: statistics: max connection rate %{NUMBER:postfix_anvil_conn_rate}/%{POSTFIX_TIME_UNIT:postfix_anvil_conn_period} for \(%{DATA:postfix_service}:%{IP:postfix_client_ip}\) at %{SYSLOGTIMESTAMP:postfix_anvil_timestamp}

source.@value:
pipeline "Mailcow - Netfilter"
stage 0 match either
rule "mailcow_netfilter_grok"
stage 1 match either
rule "mailcow_netfilter_details"
stage 2 match either
rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_1"
rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_2"
rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_3"
rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_4"
rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_5"
rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_7"
end

pipeline "Mailcow - Postfix"
stage 0 match either
rule "mailcow_postfix"
stage 1 match either
rule "mailcow_postfix_ip_details"
end

pipeline "Mailcow"
stage 0 match either
rule "mailcow_postfix"
rule "mailcow_netfilter_grok"
stage 2 match either
rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_1"
rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_2"
rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_3"
rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_4"
rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_5"
rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_7"
stage 1 match either
rule "mailcow_netfilter_details"
rule "mailcow_postfix_ip_details"
end

rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_5"
when
  has_field("netfilter_rule_id") AND to_long($message.netfilter_rule_id) == 5
then
  set_field("netfilter_rule_description", "Invalid Mailcow UI credentials");
end

rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_2"
when
  has_field("netfilter_rule_id") AND to_long($message.netfilter_rule_id) == 2
then
  set_field("netfilter_rule_description", "SMTP auth failed");
end

rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_3"
when
  has_field("netfilter_rule_id") AND to_long($message.netfilter_rule_id) == 3
then
  set_field("netfilter_rule_description", "SMTP abort login");
end

rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_7"
when
  has_field("netfilter_rule_id") AND to_long($message.netfilter_rule_id) == 7
then
  set_field("netfilter_rule_description", "Rspamd UI: Invalid password");
end

rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_1"
when
  has_field("netfilter_rule_id") AND to_long($message.netfilter_rule_id) == 1
then
  set_field("netfilter_rule_description", "SASL authentication failed");
end

rule "mailcow_netfilter_rule_details_4"
when
  has_field("netfilter_rule_id") AND to_long($message.netfilter_rule_id) == 4
then
  set_field("netfilter_rule_description", "Invalid SOGo login");
end

description.@value: All log messages from mailcow rspamd
All log messages from mailcow rspamd
